text: Violeta Barrios Torres de Chamorro (Born October 18, 1929 in Rivas, Nicaragua) is a Nicaraguan . She and was President of Nicaragua from 1990 to 1996. Her husband, Pedro Chamorro, was a newspaper editor. He was assassinated in 1978. She took over as editor of the paper, La Prensa. ==References== Category:Presidents of Nicaragua Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Journalists
title: Violeta Chamorro
